xmlText.hl2: ATP World Tour Ecuador Open Results
xmlText.p: Roberto Carballes Baena, Spain, def. Paolo Lorenzi (4), Italy, 7-6 (4), 7-5.
Nicolas Jarry (8), Chile, def. Stefano Travaglia, Italy, 4-6, 7-6 (5), 6-3.
Gerald Melzer, Austria, def. Victor Estrella Burgos (6), Dominican Republic, 4-6, 6-1, 6-4.
Albert Ramos-Vinolas, Spain, def. Roberto Quiroz, Ecuador, 6-3, 3-6, 6-3.
Corentin Moutet, France, def. Ivo Karlovic (7), Croatia, 7-5, 6-7 (3), 7-6 (6).
Thiago Monteiro, Brazil, def. Alessandro Giannessi, Italy, 7-6 (4), 4-6, 7-5.
Gael Monfils (3), France, def. Casper Ruud, Norway, 6-4, 3-6, 6-4.
Andrej Martin, Slovakia, def. Pablo Carreno Busta (1), Spain, 6-4, 6-2.
Austin Krajicek and Jackson Withrow, United States, def. Sergio Galdos, Peru, and Gerald Melzer, Austria, 6-4, 7-6 (3).
Nicolas Jarry and Hans Podlipnik-Castillo, Chile, def. Santiago Gonzalez and Miguel Andel Reyes-Varela (3), Mexico, 6-7 (2), 6-4, 10-6.
Alessandro Motti and Stefano Travaglia, Italy, def. Gonzalo Escorbar and Roberto Quiroz, Ecuador, 7-6 (6), 6-7 (5), 10-7.
Dorian Descloix and Gael Monfils, France, def. Victor Estrella Burgos, Dominican Republic, and Casper Ruud, Norway, 6-2, 7-5.
